column4: I've downloaded the 8.04 ISO and burned it to disk. It boots with no probelm, but when I get to the disk partitioning point; it's identifying the internal hard drive as "sda".  I can't seem to partition an "sda".
Every other distribution I've ever loaded identifies this drive as "hda".
This same hardware has had FC4, Knoppix, and Gentoo loaded, so I feel pretty sure that the hardware is kind of linux compatable
what is the specific problem that you have when partitioning ?
